qas.question: What is the major hockey league team of Bern?
What year was the IIHF Ice Hockey World Championship held in Bern?

context: <a0_0>SC Bern<a0_0/> is the major ice hockey team of Bern who plays at the <a1_0>PostFinance Arena<a1_0/>. The team has ranked highest in attendance for a European hockey team for more than a decade. The PostFinance Arena was the main host of the <a2_0>2009<a2_0/> IIHF Ice Hockey World Championship, including the opening game and the final of the tournament.
